body: The dataloader needs a sampler to operate, which gives a batch of indices or batch_size to get data from the dataset via get_batch call. The BatchSizeSample simply allow the dataset to call get_batch() with batch_size without changing the code in the dataloader.
body_html: The dataloader needs a sampler to operate, which gives a batch of indices or batch_size to get data from the dataset via get_batch call. The BatchSizeSample simply allow the dataset to call get_batch() with batch_size without changing the code in the dataloader.
